Package com.java.model.player

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AggresiveMode
    This class is a player strategy that is created in startuphase.java and is a subclass of player strategy, all the methods are called from player(context class) the methods called are reinforce - place armies in the strongest country.
    AggressiveModeTest
    This class tests the aggressive strategy behavior.
    AttackPhaseState
    This class models the state of attack phase to be presented in phase View.
    BenevolentMode
    This class is a player strategy that is created in startuphase.java and is a subclass of player strategy, all the methods are called from player(context class) the methods called are reinforce - place armies in the weakest country.
    BenevolentModeTest
    This class test the benevolent strategy behavior.
    CheaterMode
    This class is a player strategy that is created startuphase.java and is a subclass of player strategy, all the methods are called from player(context class) the methods called are reinforce - doubled the number of armies on all countries owned fortify- doubles army for country that is surrounded by the enemies and attack will automatically own the country the neighbours.
    CheaterModeTest
    This class test the cheater strategy behavior.
    FortificationPhaseState
    This class models the state of Fortification phase to be presented in phase View.
    HumanMode
    This class is a player strategy that is created startuphase.java and is a subclass of player strategy, all the methods are called from player(context class).
    Player
    This class models the player, it holds the strategy and the main methods to perform one turn.
    PlayerStrategy
    This class models the player strategy, it holds the id, the name, and the order to play for the round robing.
    PlayerTestSuite  
    RandomMode
    This class is a player strategy that is created in startuphase.java and is a subclass of player strategy, all the methods are called from player(context class) the methods called are reinforce - a random country.
    RandomModeTest
    This class tests the random strategy behavior.
    ReinforcementPhaseState
    This class models the state of Reinforcement phase to be presented in phase View.
